name: Modern Languages (French, German, Spanish)
aboutCourse:
The course is provided through Coventry University and is a blend of onsite learning and structured taught sessions. Some sessions will be remote learning and during the year these are hoped to more to face to face sessions.
The course content is in line with the teaching standards and more details can be found on the Coventry University website.
Please see E-ACT Website https://www.e-act.org.uk/work-for-us/ for more details and to apply.
howSchoolPlacementsWork: We have a number of locations where employment opportunities and placements take place. Please see E-ACT Website https://www.e-act.org.uk/work-for-us/ for more details and to apply.
